businessdescription_label: Rukuni na kasuwanci yana da cikakken ganewa a matsayin ɗan ƙasa ta hannun kamfanonin da ke cikin jiha, tare da damar samun bayanai masu yawa kan kasuwanci.
studentdescription_label: Rukunin dalibi ana gane shi da cikakken ɗan ƙasa, yana da damar samun kiwon lafiya kyauta, tallafi da kuɗaɗen karatu
residentdescription_label: Rukunin mazaunin ƙasa shine wanda aka haifa, ɗan asali ko wanda aka yi wa zama halal, yana da damar ayyuka da dama
teacherdescription_label: Rukunin malamai su ne masu ilimantar da matasa, suna da damar samun ayyuka da bashi
civilservantdescription_label: Rukunin ma’aikata na gwamnati su ne ke taimakawa gwamnati da rubuce-rubuce, suna da damar ayyuka da dama

traderdescription_label: Rukunin ‘yan kasuwa su ne masu kasuwanci a kasuwa tare da fa’idodi da dama
uniondescription_label: Rukunin ƙungiya su ne NURTW da membobinsu
